useCase.name: Creating a New User
useCase.description: As an Admin, I want to create a new user.

mainSequence.step: Admin initiates the creation of a new user.
Admin requests data input (first name, last name, email, password, password confirmation, phone number, user type).
Admin enters the data (first name, last name, email, password, password confirmation, phone number, user type).
EletricGo shows the entered data and requests confirmation.
EletricGo informs the success of the operation.
